After reading discussions of how to pronounce “omicron” I’ve come to the conclusion that we’ve been mispronouncing “microeconomics” in American English. Henceforth it’s mickroeconomics for me. Or I have to start saying omycron.

62.6% with the correct answer. I'm not a fan of the phrase because it can make one think it's something other than OLS. The shorthand isn't too problematical in this case ....
